title: tryndamere crit me 7 times in a row
body:
not to mention every time he aa poked me in lane it was a crit
thank fucking god
did i mention once he hit level 6 he walked into me E's 20 fucking times perma slows me while he gets 700000 free aas off and then lives with 3% hp because his ults balanced? thanks riot
go fuck yourself
 I LOST GAME TO A DICE ROLL
I RUSHED  ARMOR
